participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, loves engaging in conversations about cars and pets.
participant_1.background: I enjoy spending time with my grandparents and hearing about their stories. I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs. I believe that mermaids are real. I'm an excellent caretaker for my pets. I have a pet dog who is always happy to see me, no matter how bad my day was.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys expressing herself through art and music.
participant_2.background: I get to be myself when I play with my dogs and make pottery. I am the oldest sibling. I collect music and other things that represent my personality and interests. I'd be scared to tell my family, but I think they'd be accepting. I was sad when my cat died last year.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play with my dogs, make pottery, and collect music.
I like to spend time with my dog too! He's always so happy to see me.
Me too! My dogs are my best friends.
What kind of music do you like to collect?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock right now.
Oh cool! I like indie rock too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Shins, The National, and The Decemberists.
Oh nice! I like all of those bands too!
Me too! I'm so glad I met you! We have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
